post.body: Hi all this my first post

Huge explosion reported in Kabul hours after deadly twin blasts
 A massive blast reportedly rocked the Afghan capital, Kabul, late Monday â€“ just hours after two deadly bombs went off near the Afghan Defense Ministry. The latest blast was followed by gunfire, Reuters reports.

The cause of the blast is not yet known, and it is also unknown whether it has caused any casualties so far.
More info https://www.rt.com/news/358356-huge-explosion-in-kabul/
Give a man an 0day and he'll have access for a day, teach a man to phish and he'll have access for life.
